text: Lieutenant General Joshua Mahamadu Hamidu (1936 â€“ 2 February 2021) was a Ghanaian soldier, politician and diplomat. He was the Chief of Defence Staff from 1978 to 1979. He was the Ghanaian High Commissioner to Zambia in 1978 for a short time. He was also High Commissioner to Zambia from 2003 to 2005. Hamidu died on 2 February 2021 at an Accra hospital. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ghanaian politicians Category:Ghanaian diplomats Category:African military people
title: Joshua Hamidu
